sponsor.intro: This project started from the following problem:
sponsor.quote: It's cumbersome for everyone to search for my username just to introduce my profile page.
sponsor.cost: However, we now bear the cost of running the service and $99 annual fee for the Apple Developer Program.
sponsor.appeal: We would greatly appreciate your warm support to keep this service running.
sponsor.qrDesc: This feature requires the Toss app on a mobile device.

collection.title: 1. Personal Information Collected and Purpose
collection.content:
We collect only the minimum personal information necessary for QR code generation and email delivery.
Collected information is not stored or used for any other purpose.

retention.title: 2. Data Retention and Deletion Policy
retention.content:
All collected data including account numbers and email addresses are sent via email after being queued, and are deleted immediately after the email is sent.
Deleted information cannot be recovered and is not stored on the server.

sharing.title: 3. Third-Party Sharing and Processing
sharing.content: We do not share users' personal information with third parties. However, exceptions may be made for legal requests.

security.title: 4. Privacy Protection and Security Measures
security.content:
All data transmitted to the server is encrypted.
No one except administrators can access personal information in the queue.

rights.title: 5. User Rights and Privacy Inquiries
rights.content:
Users can request deletion of personal information and check processing history.
Contact email: pass.connects.im@gmail.com
